panels.title: Storage space total vs used across network

targets.expr:
max by (host)(rate(audius_cn_state_machine_find_sync_requests_job_duration_seconds_count{environment=~"$environment", uncaughtError="false"}[1h])) / 
((max by (host)(rate(audius_cn_state_machine_find_sync_requests_job_duration_seconds_count{environment=~"$environment", uncaughtError="false"}[1h]))) + (max by (host)(rate(audius_cn_state_machine_find_sync_requests_job_duration_seconds_count{environment=~"$environment", uncaughtError="true"}[1h]))))

rate(audius_cn_jobs_completed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host"}[1m]) / (rate(audius_cn_jobs_failed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host"}[1m]) + rate(audius_cn_jobs_completed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host"}[1m]))

rate(audius_cn_jobs_completed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"asyncProcessing", host=~"$host"}[1m]) / (rate(audius_cn_jobs_failed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"asyncProcessing", host=~"$host"}[1m]) + rate(audius_cn_jobs_completed_total{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"asyncProcessing", host=~"$host"}[1m]))

panels.title: Async Queue Success Rate by Job

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_jobs_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host", status!="failed"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_jobs_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host", status!="failed"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_jobs_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host", status!="failed"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_jobs_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host", status!="failed"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le) (rate(audius_cn_jobs_duration_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", queue_name=~"$queue", host=~"$host", status="failed"}[$__rate_interval])))
